biotools.summary: CUDASW++ (compute unified device architecture) is a bioinformatics software for Smith-Waterman protein database searches that takes advantage of the massively parallel CUDA architecture of NVIDIA Tesla GPUs to perform fast sequence searches.

bioschemas.name: CUDASW++
bioschemas.summary: CUDASW++ (compute unified device architecture) is a bioinformatics software for Smith-Waterman protein database searches that takes advantage of the massively parallel CUDA architecture of NVIDIA Tesla GPUs to perform fast sequence searches.
